forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 7 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 55. Southwest wind 8 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
Today in Downtown San Francisco, the morning greets you with a refreshing embrace of sunshine, casting a warm golden glow over the iconic skyline. The air feels invigorating, tempered by a gentle southwest breeze fluttering through the streets. As the day unfolds, temperatures will gracefully tilt towards the low sixties, a pleasant reminder of the ever-present maritime influence. Whatever glimpse of fog that may have lingered in the recesses of the bay has dissipated, revealing the shimmering waters and the grandeur of the Golden Gate Bridge against a backdrop of cerulean skies. 

As evening approaches, the clouds will softly embrace the horizon, settling into a cooler ambiance that rests comfortably around fifty-five degrees. The wind will continue to sway, lightly rustling leaves and carrying the scent of the ocean. For those venturing out, it is advisable to layer your attire—a light jacket or sweater to ward off the nippy breeze as dusk descends—perfect for a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or an intimate rendezvous at a café. With such a gentle unfolding of the day, the city beckons with possibilities—perhaps a quiet afternoon in a local park or diving into a new book at a cozy bookstore. Embrace these moments, for they weave the fabric of the everyday joys found in this vibrant city.
